high_descs: Turn around and turn left and then head straight towards the bed
Pick up credit card from the bed
Go straight towards the wall and then walk straight into the room, turning to the desk lamp on your right
anns.task_desc: Examine a credit card by the light of a desk lamp

high_descs: Turn right and head straight, then hang left towards the bed.
Pick up credit card from the desk.
Go left and head straight towards the wall. After that, turn left and walk straight into the room, turning to the desk lamp on your right.
anns.task_desc: Examine a credit card by the light of a floor lamp.

high_descs: Go straight, turn left and make a turn right towards the bed
Pick up credit card from the bed
Turn right and go straight, turn left towards the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a credit card by the light of a desk lamp
